thread.title: Oil soars 10% for biggest 1-day rise since 2009
thread.title_full: Oil soars 10% for biggest 1-day rise since 2009 - MarketWatch

author: MarketWatch
title: Oil soars 10% for biggest 1-day rise since 2009
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE Oil futures jump more than 10% after a report that Venezuela has asked the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries to hold an emergency meeting. See full story.
Now’s the right time for Yellen to kill the ‘Greenspan put’ The market selloff has made a September rate hike by the Fed even more compelling than it was before, because it gives Janet Yellen the opportunity she needs to kill the “Greenspan put” once and for all. See full story.
Tesla Model S scores 103 from Consumer Reports on 100-point scale More powerful version of all-electric sedan earns a ‘rare’ high score, Consumer Reports said. See full story.
10 most expensive places to raise a family in the U.S. In some spots in this country, it costs parents more than six figures just to eke by. See full story.
Central bankers at Jackson Hole search for answers on low inflation Why is inflation so low? That’s the mystery the Fed and global central bankers will explore at this year’s Jackson Hole summit. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
More from MarketWatch
